# Step 00. prep some data, records and flat

```{r prep}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)

Titanic %>% 
  data.frame() %>% 
  uncount(weights = Freq) ->
tidy_titanic ; tidy_titanic %>% head()

Titanic %>% 
  data.frame() ->
flat_titanic ; flat_titanic %>% head()
```
